mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, VCTN_DTL_NO, VCTN_STDT, VCTN_ENDT FROM EMP_TB LEFT JOIN VCTN_HIS_TB USING (EMP_NO) WHERE VCTN_STDT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{srcDateStart},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{srcDateEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT * FROM EMP_TB E LEFT JOIN DEPT_TB D USING (DEPT_CD) LEFT JOIN JOB_TB J USING (JOB_CD) WHERE EMP_NO = #{EMP_NO}
SELECT * FROM EMP_TB E LEFT JOIN DEPT_TB D USING (DEPT_CD) LEFT JOIN JOB_TB J USING (JOB_CD) LEFT JOIN LOG_TB USING (EMP_NO) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM LOG_TB WHERE TO_CHAR(DAY,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND INOUT_FG IN 'I' AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}
